content: This breakdown appears to outline the percentage of fees that are taken from a sell transaction on the #Endgame platform, with the referral system providing a discount on these fees. The percentages allocated to various uses such as liquidity, RFV, and the Battle Royal Champion System, as well as a small percentage going to a "rebaser wallet." It is not entirely clear what the specific use case of these different systems are, but they seem to be a way of allocating the fees collected from sell transactions to different aspects of the platform.
